name: S.H.E.
description:
An Android named S.H.E. (Super Helpful Entity) lands on Earth and the roboticist who made S.H.E. assigns tasks for S.H.E. to do. The roboticist (the player) has to implement modules for S.H.E. remotely to help her achieve her tasks. The roboticist connects these modules by connecting wires that allow S.H.E. to either gain an ability or an understanding of the task. The player then controls S.H.E. through a platforming level collecting items until it is time for the next stage and a new module.

This game was a submission for the 2020 Global Game Jam.
